flawed_nl_solution:
She reads 90-60=<<90-60=30>>30 pages in an hour.
She needs to read 210-90=<<210-90=210>>210 more pages.
For an additional 210 pages, she will need 210/30=<<210/30=7>>7 hours.
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 210. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
